title: Top cotton exporting countries 2018/2019
summary: The United_States was the world 's Top cotton exporting Exports by a distance in , with a thousand of 3214 thousand bales .
To give this figure some context , Brazil was second in the ranking valued at 1309 thousand bales , substantially lower in thousand than that of the United_States .
Many of the world 's Top cotton countries come from the United_States .
gold: The United States was the leading exporter of cotton worldwide in 2018/2019 . In that time period , the U.S. cotton industry had an export volume of 3.21 million metric tons . Cotton products Cotton is one of the most versatile and widely used materials .
